edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog.bc

Class ECPointBc

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.primitives.dlog.bc.ECPointBc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ECElement, GroupElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECF2mPointBc, ECFpPointBc

    public abstract class ECPointBc
extends java.lang.Object
implements ECElement
    This class is an adapter for BC point.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object elementToCompare)
      Two points are equal if they are both of type ECPointBc and their (x,y) coordinates are equal.
      GroupElementSendableData generateSendableData()
      This function is used when a group element needs to be sent via a Channel or any other means of sending data (including serialization).
      java.math.BigInteger getX()
      This function returns the x coordinate of the (x,y) point which is an element of a given elliptic curve.
      java.math.BigInteger getY()
      This function returns the y coordinate of the (x,y) point which is an element of a given elliptic curve.
      boolean isIdentity()
      checks if the element is the identity of this Dlog group.
      boolean isInfinity()
      Elliptic curve has a unique point called infinity.

      • getX

        public java.math.BigInteger getX()
        Description copied from interface: ECElement
        This function returns the x coordinate of the (x,y) point which is an element of a given elliptic curve. In case of infinity point, returns null.
        Specified by:
        getX in interface ECElement
        Returns:
        x coordinate of (x,y) point

      • getY

        public java.math.BigInteger getY()
        Description copied from interface: ECElement
        This function returns the y coordinate of the (x,y) point which is an element of a given elliptic curve. In case of infinity point, returns null.
        Specified by:
        getY in interface ECElement
        Returns:
        y coordinate of (x,y) point

      • isIdentity

        public boolean isIdentity()
        checks if the element is the identity of this Dlog group.
        Specified by:
        isIdentity in interface GroupElement
        Returns:
        true if this element is the identity of the group; false otherwise.

      • isInfinity

        public boolean isInfinity()
        Description copied from interface: ECElement
        Elliptic curve has a unique point called infinity. In order to know if this object is an infinity point, this function should be called.
        Specified by:
        isInfinity in interface ECElement
        Returns:
        true if this point is the infinity, false, otherwise.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object elementToCompare)
        Two points are equal if they are both of type ECPointBc and their (x,y) coordinates are equal.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object

      • generateSendableData

        public GroupElementSendableData generateSendableData()
        Description copied from interface: GroupElement
        This function is used when a group element needs to be sent via a Channel or any other means of sending data (including serialization). It retrieves all the data needed to reconstruct this Group Element at a later time and/or in a different VM. It puts all the data in an instance of the relevant class that implements the GroupElementSendableData interface.
        Specified by:
        generateSendableData in interface GroupElement
        Returns:
        the GroupElementSendableData object
        See Also:
        GroupElement.generateSendableData()
